name: WindowGroup
desc: A scene that presents a group of identically structured windows.

items.name: init(Text, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a localized title.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a key for localized title string.

items.name: init<S>(S, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a title string.

items.name: init(id: String, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with an identifier.

items.name: init(Text, id: String, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a localized title and an identifier.

items.name: init(LocalizedStringKey, id: String, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a key for localized title string and an identifier.

items.name: init<S>(S, id: String, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates a window group with a title string and an identifier.

items.name: var body: some Scene
items.desc: The content and behavior of the scene.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of scene that represents the body of this scene.
